OOC:  Okay,  I have to yell at LegendaryNemasis and DewBoy.  REmember 
you two I am a council member and I am getting tired of all your 
arguing.  If you two want to argue make it private emails.  If either 
of you reply to this email in Nbwrpg I will give you a punishment.  
If you two argue agin in nbwrpg I will punish you.  Dewboy, you say 
you have all these major ideas, Send them to me and Rdahl.  Also 
dewboy, you can't just have your characters arrive in maximal city 
without posting them entering maximal city.  That means you have to 
wait for someone to let you in if you are not on the visiter list and 
I didn't see the post having your characters let in Maximal city.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Although asking fox to make a cartoon of the RPG would prove to be

beggining

long since

dont have
